    • Field Detail

      • ALPHA

        public static java.lang.String ALPHA
        Regular expression containing all alphabet characters and space. Can be zero or more occurances of these characters

      • ALPHANUMERIC

        public static java.lang.String ALPHANUMERIC
        Regular expression containing all alphabet characters, space, and 1-9. Can be zero or more occurances of these characters

      • NUMERIC

        public static java.lang.String NUMERIC
        Regular expression containing one or more occurances of 1-9 or zero or more occurances of 0-9

      • NUMERICDEC

        public static java.lang.String NUMERICDEC
        Regular expression containing zero or more occurances of 0-9, followed by a period, followed by one or more occurances of 0-9

    • Constructor Detail

      • TextFieldRequired

        public TextFieldRequired()
        Constructor

    • Method Detail

      • setRequired

        public void setRequired(boolean r)
        Setter method for isRequired
        Parameters:
        r - Boolean value to set the TextField as required or not

      • isRequired

        public boolean isRequired()
        Getter method for variable isRequired
        Returns:
        Boolean value of if the TextField is currently set to required

      • setValidation

        public void setValidation(java.lang.String regex,
                          java.lang.String validationPrompt)
        Sets the validation prompt for the TextField as well as the regular expression which the entered text be tested against
        Parameters:
        regex - String containing a regular expression
        validationPrompt - String of the message that will appear when the mouse hovers over the TextField

      • validate

        public boolean validate()
        If the field is required (isRequired set to True), checks for if the entered text matches the currently set regular expression
        Returns:
        Boolean value that is true if isRequired is set to true and the result of isValid() is true

      • isValid

        public boolean isValid()
        Checks the text that is currently entered in the TextField to see if it matches the currently set regular expression. Will affect the style of the TextField depending upon the returned value
        Returns:
        Boolean value that is true if the field is empty, true if the entered text matches the currently set regular expression, and false if there is text and it doesn't match

      • isValid

        public boolean isValid(java.lang.String text)
        Tests the input parameter String to see if it matches the currently set regular expression pattern
        Parameters:
        text - String of text to be tested against the currently set regular expression
        Returns:
        Boolean value for if it matches the set regular expression

      • isValidNoEffect

        public boolean isValidNoEffect()
        Used to validate a field without affecting its style
        Returns:
        Boolean value of if the text in the text field matches the currently set regular expression
